title: Custom Select component
problem: Native <select> looks ugly; dark mode dropdown unreadable; no rounded corners on some platforms
done_when: All selects replaced with custom component; dark-mode readable; rounded corners visible

title: Remove Mods UI
problem: Mods list/modal is ugly and not needed
done_when: Mods button/modal removed; no mods UI shown anywhere

title: Modrinth modpack can start
problem: Installed Modrinth modpack (.mrpack) cannot start because it only unzips without installing loader/mods
done_when: Installing a Modrinth mrpack provisions Fabric server jar + downloads mods; Install & Start works for Fabric packs

title: CurseForge without env var setup
problem: CurseForge requires server env API key; users expect easier setup / direct install
done_when: Panel Settings supports entering API key; CurseForge search is disabled with clear CTA; direct URL install works without key

title: Simplify awkward flows
problem: Overall workflow feels weird; too much low-value info in UI
done_when: Install flow clearer; sidebar footer simplified; sensible defaults and messages

title: Select dropdown clipped
problem: Custom Select menu is clipped by containers with overflow hidden (sidebar/topbar), causing theme/daemon dropdown unusable
done_when: Theme/daemon dropdown menus fully visible and selectable everywhere

title: Games toolbar UX
problem: Games page action buttons feel messy and hard to scan
done_when: Games toolbar has clear primary action + compact secondary actions

title: Lock actions while busy
problem: Users can spam Start/Stop/Restart/Delete causing duplicate daemon commands and weird state
done_when: Game actions are disabled while requests are in flight; UI indicates busy

title: Backup button
problem: Daemon has mc_backup but UI has no one-click backup
done_when: Games UI can create a backup and show the generated path

title: Restore from backup
problem: Daemon has mc_restore but UI has no restore workflow
done_when: Games UI can restore from a selected backup with strong confirmation

title: List backups
problem: Backups are hidden under servers/_backups and hard to find
done_when: Games UI shows available backups for current instance and can open in Files tab

title: Persist UI state
problem: Selected tab/daemon/game resets on refresh
done_when: Persist tab/daemon/game/theme in localStorage and restore on load

title: Better error surfacing
problem: Errors often disappear in status text and are easy to miss
done_when: All failed operations show a toast with Copy details

title: Responsive sidebar
problem: Sidebar is always visible and cramped on small screens
done_when: Add collapsible sidebar + overlay mode for narrow widths

title: Keyboard shortcuts
problem: Frequent actions require mouse clicks
done_when: Add shortcuts: Ctrl+K command palette, Esc closes modals, / focuses search

title: Nodes overview improvements
problem: Nodes list lacks quick health glance and sorting options
done_when: Add sorting, filters, and clearer online/offline + last seen

title: Copy deploy snippet
problem: Deploying daemon requires manual compose editing
done_when: Provide one-click copy docker-compose snippet per node

title: Binary file handling
problem: Editing binary files as text is confusing and can corrupt data
done_when: Detect binary and show download-only view

title: Create new file
problem: Cannot create new file from Files UI
done_when: Add Create file action with safe path validation

title: File search
problem: Finding a file in large directories is painful
done_when: Add client-side filter/search for current directory listing

title: Quick open common files
problem: Common server files require manual navigation
done_when: Add shortcuts: server.properties, eula.txt, logs/latest.log, .elegantmc.json

title: Log highlighting
problem: Logs are hard to scan for errors/warnings
done_when: Highlight ERROR/WARN/Exception lines and allow toggle

title: Log pause
problem: Live logs auto-scroll makes reading hard
done_when: Add pause/resume streaming view per tab

title: Jar picker
problem: Jar path is manual and error-prone
done_when: Settings can browse and pick a .jar under instance directory

title: Server.properties editor
problem: Port and other settings require manual file editing
done_when: Add basic server.properties editor with safe keys

title: Instance rename
problem: Renaming instance id is not supported
done_when: Add rename workflow (move folder + update configs + FRP proxy name)

title: Instance clone
problem: Copying servers requires manual filesystem work
done_when: Add clone workflow using backup/restore or fs_copy

title: Instance disk usage
problem: No per-instance size info
done_when: Show instance folder size and last backup time

title: Upload mrpack
problem: Upload flow only accepts .zip and is confusing for .mrpack files
done_when: Allow uploading .mrpack and treat it like Modrinth mrpack install

title: Better zip jar detection
problem: Zip installs often fail because jar_path is wrong after extraction
done_when: After unzip, auto-detect server jar (including subdirs) or prompt selection

title: Parallel mrpack downloads
problem: Mrpack files download sequentially and can be slow
done_when: Download mrpack files with limited concurrency and progress

title: Show mrpack metadata
problem: User cannot see loader/minecraft version before install
done_when: Display minecraft version + loader + file count before install

title: Quilt mrpack support
problem: Quilt-based mrpacks cannot be installed
done_when: Support quilt-loader dependency and install quilt server jar

title: Forge/NeoForge server packs
problem: Many modpacks require Forge/NeoForge and currently fail
done_when: Support server pack zip workflow and clear guidance

title: CurseForge direct URL helper
problem: CurseForge links are not straightforward for users
done_when: Add helper UI to accept CurseForge page URL and guide to direct download

title: FRP status clarity
problem: FRP state is confusing when disabled/misconfigured
done_when: Show explicit FRP desired vs actual status and next steps

title: FRP test button
problem: Users cannot test FRP profile before using
done_when: Add Test connection button and show latency/errors

title: FRP proxy list
problem: Multiple proxies per instance are hard to view
done_when: Show per-instance proxy details (name, remote addr, port)

title: Scheduler UI
problem: Daemon supports schedule.json but Panel has no UI
done_when: Add simple scheduler view to edit schedule.json and trigger tasks

title: fs_copy command
problem: UI cannot implement rename/clone without file copy support
done_when: Add fs_copy for files/dirs inside sandbox (safe, no overwrite)

title: fs_stat command
problem: File UI lacks mtime and type details
done_when: Add fs_stat returning size, mtime, mode, isDir

title: fs_list include mtime
problem: File list cannot show last modified
done_when: Extend fs_list entries with mtime_unix

title: MC jar detection command
problem: Panel needs reliable jar selection for zip installs
done_when: Add mc_detect_jar to scan instance dir and return best jar path

title: Heartbeat java details
problem: Users cannot see what Java is actually used per instance
done_when: Include selected java path/major and required major in heartbeat instances

title: Java cache management
problem: Auto-downloaded JREs can accumulate with no cleanup
done_when: Add command to list/remove cached Java runtimes

title: Improved port check diagnostics
problem: Port check failure message is too generic
done_when: Return host/port and helpful hints (docker mapping, server-ip)

title: Persist sessions
problem: Admin session is memory-only and lost on restart
done_when: Persist sessions to disk with TTL and cleanup

title: Audit log
problem: No audit trail for destructive/admin actions
done_when: Write admin action audit log to panel data dir

title: Command allowlist
problem: Advanced command runner can do risky operations
done_when: Add server-side allowlist/denylist for advanced commands

title: Update docs for mrpack
problem: Docs do not explain mrpack limitations
done_when: Document Fabric-only mrpack support and URL install mode

title: Update docs for backups
problem: Backup/restore features are not documented
done_when: Add README section for backup/restore and backup location

title: Panel lint in CI
problem: Panel build can pass but hide type issues
done_when: Add typecheck step for Panel in CI

title: Frontend smoke tests
problem: No automated UI regression checks
done_when: Add minimal Playwright smoke test for login + theme

title: Reduce log re-render cost
problem: Logs re-render can be heavy with many lines
done_when: Virtualize log rendering and memoize formatting

title: Debounce search inputs
problem: Search inputs trigger expensive filtering on each keystroke
done_when: Debounce log and file search inputs

title: Internationalization baseline
problem: UI mixes English/Chinese inconsistently
done_when: Create i18n dictionary and move strings behind it

title: Consistent copywriting
problem: Labels and hints are inconsistent across tabs
done_when: Standardize wording, capitalization, and hint style

title: Skip unnecessary Java auto-download
problem: Daemon downloads Temurin JRE even when selected Java already meets requirement, wasting time and confusing users
done_when: When selectedMajor >= requiredMajor, no auto-download is attempted and logs do not mention downloading

title: Clarify Java selection logs
problem: Startup logs show 'required>=X' but can still mention downloading X, which makes users think Java X is used by default
done_when: Logs explicitly state which Java is used and why (system vs cached) and never contradict required>= wording

title: Show Java info in Games UI
problem: Users cannot quickly tell which Java runtime is used for each instance
done_when: Games list/details show java path, selected major, and required major when available

title: EULA helper flow
problem: Servers often fail to start due to eula.txt missing/false and the UI does not guide the user
done_when: When start fails due to EULA, UI offers one-click set eula=true with explicit confirmation

title: server.properties editor
problem: Editing server.properties manually is error-prone and hard for beginners
done_when: UI provides a basic form editor for common server.properties keys and saves safely

title: Validate instance IDs and names
problem: Weird instance IDs/names can break paths, scripts, or UI rendering
done_when: Create/rename flow validates and normalizes IDs; invalid input is blocked with clear error

title: Instance tags/labels
problem: Users with many instances cannot categorize or filter quickly
done_when: Instances support user-defined tags and tags are visible and filterable in list

title: Instance search and filters
problem: Finding an instance in a long list is slow
done_when: Games list supports search by name/id and filters by status/tag

title: Duplicate instance action
problem: Creating a similar server requires repeating many steps
done_when: UI can duplicate an instance directory with a new ID and adjusts common files safely

title: Export instance to zip
problem: Sharing/backing up an instance is manual and error-prone
done_when: UI can export a selected instance directory as a downloadable zip

title: Import instance from zip
problem: Restoring an instance requires manual unzip and wiring
done_when: UI can upload/import an instance zip into a new instance folder with validation

title: Soft delete instances
problem: Accidental deletes are irreversible and scary
done_when: Delete moves instance to a trash folder and offers restore for a period

title: Trash folder commands
problem: Panel needs safe delete/restore operations but daemon lacks primitives
done_when: Daemon adds commands to move paths to trash and restore them safely

title: Backup retention policy
problem: Backups can grow unbounded and waste disk
done_when: Daemon supports keeping last N backups per instance and pruning older backups

title: Schedule backups from UI
problem: Backups require manual clicks and are easy to forget
done_when: Scheduler UI includes a preset to run backups and optionally prune old backups

title: Cron builder and validation
problem: Cron expressions are hard to write and easy to get wrong
done_when: Scheduler UI provides a cron builder and validates next run times

title: Scheduler task templates
problem: Common tasks require re-typing commands
done_when: Provide templates for restart, stop, backup, prune logs, and announce messages

title: Download latest.log
problem: Users often need to share logs for debugging
done_when: Logs view includes a one-click download for latest.log (and gz where available)

title: Copy log line
problem: Copying a specific line is tedious
done_when: Each rendered log line has a copy button with visual feedback

title: Scroll-to-bottom indicator
problem: Users lose track when new logs arrive while scrolled up
done_when: Show a 'new logs' pill that jumps to bottom and resumes follow

title: Smart auto-follow
problem: Auto-scroll behavior feels jumpy and unpredictable
done_when: Auto-follow only when near bottom; scrolling up auto-pauses and can resume

title: Regex log filter
problem: Simple substring search is not enough for power users
done_when: Logs filter supports optional regex mode with safe limits and error display

title: Clear log viewport
problem: Long sessions get noisy and hard to reason about
done_when: Add a 'Clear view' action that resets the client-side log buffer

title: Consistent modal styling
problem: Dialogs look inconsistent across views
done_when: All modals share consistent padding, radius, and header actions

title: Skeleton loaders
problem: Loading states flash text and feel rough
done_when: Add skeleton placeholders for lists and cards while data loads

title: Toast improvements
problem: Toasts can overlap and vanish too fast for errors
done_when: Toast stack has max count, pause-on-hover, and 'Copy details' for errors

title: UI error boundary
problem: A single render error can break the entire panel view
done_when: Add a top-level error boundary with a reset option and debug details

title: Mobile Games layout
problem: Games actions still feel cramped on small screens
done_when: Games view uses a responsive layout with an overflow menu on narrow widths

title: Select keyboard navigation
problem: Custom Select lacks good keyboard UX compared to native select
done_when: Select supports arrow navigation, typeahead, Enter select, and Esc close

title: Accessible focus rings
problem: Focus indicators are inconsistent and sometimes invisible in dark mode
done_when: All interactive controls show clear focus ring with WCAG-friendly colors

title: ARIA labels for icon buttons
problem: Icon-only buttons are not accessible
done_when: All icon buttons have aria-labels and tooltips

title: System theme option
problem: Users want the UI to follow OS light/dark automatically
done_when: Theme supports system mode and updates on prefers-color-scheme changes

title: High-contrast theme
problem: Dark mode still has low contrast in some areas
done_when: Add a high-contrast theme palette and ensure readable defaults

title: Sync theme across devices
problem: Theme preference is local-only and resets on new device/browser
done_when: Persist theme preference in server-side session and restore on login

title: Language selector
problem: Users cannot switch UI language explicitly
done_when: Add language dropdown (Chinese/English) with persistence

title: Translate remaining UI strings
problem: UI still mixes English/Chinese across many screens
done_when: All user-facing strings are moved into i18n and have zh/en translations

title: Number/date formatting
problem: Dates/sizes are formatted inconsistently across locales
done_when: Use locale-aware formatting for dates, times, and file sizes

title: In-app changelog
problem: Users cannot easily see what changed between versions
done_when: Add a 'What's new' dialog that reads CHANGELOG.md and shows latest entries

title: In-app help links
problem: Troubleshooting knowledge is only in README
done_when: Add contextual help links/tooltips to relevant docs sections

title: Diagnostic bundle command
problem: Debugging remote issues is difficult without collecting logs/configs
done_when: Daemon can generate a diagnostics zip with sanitized config and recent logs

title: Export diagnostics from Panel
problem: Users need an easy way to share diagnostics without SSH
done_when: Panel adds a button to request and download the daemon diagnostics bundle

title: Modrinth search install
problem: Installing modpacks requires pasting URLs manually
done_when: Add Modrinth search UI with version selection and one-click install

title: Per-file install progress
problem: Large modpacks feel frozen during download
done_when: Install UI shows file count, current file, and overall progress bar

title: Forge/NeoForge mrpack support
problem: Some mrpacks target Forge/NeoForge and current install flow is Fabric/Quilt-focused
done_when: Installer detects loader type and offers correct server pack instructions or automation where possible

title: Datapack installer
problem: Users frequently add datapacks and do it manually
done_when: UI can install datapacks into world/datapacks from URL or upload

title: Resource pack helper
problem: Resource pack setup is confusing for server admins
done_when: Provide helper UI for hosting and distribution hints and optional pack zip hosting

title: Compatibility preflight
problem: Modpack installs fail late due to missing loader/java mismatch
done_when: Run a preflight that checks loader, Java, disk space, and port before install/start

title: Update Modrinth modpack
problem: Users cannot easily upgrade an installed modpack to a new version
done_when: Provide 'Update pack' that downloads changes and preserves configs where safe

title: Repair instance
problem: Instances can become broken after partial installs or edits
done_when: Add a repair action that re-detects jar, checks required Java, and verifies key files

title: Upload server jar from UI
problem: Users want to install a custom jar without terminal access
done_when: Files UI supports uploading a jar and selecting it as server jar for instance

title: Drag-and-drop file upload
problem: File management is limited without upload
done_when: Files view supports drag-and-drop upload with progress and size limits

title: Upload folder via zip
problem: Uploading many files is tedious
done_when: Support uploading a zip and extracting into target directory safely

title: Rename and move files
problem: Users cannot rename/move files from the UI
done_when: Files view supports rename/move with validation and conflict checks

title: Delete files and folders
problem: Cleaning up files requires SSH
done_when: Files view supports delete with confirmation and uses trash when enabled

title: Download folder as zip
problem: Downloading a directory tree is hard
done_when: Files view supports zipping and downloading a folder server-side

title: Diff viewer
problem: Comparing config changes is hard
done_when: Add a simple diff viewer for two selected text files with syntax highlight

title: Syntax highlighting
problem: Editing config files without highlighting causes mistakes
done_when: Editor supports highlighting for properties/json/yaml/log files

title: JSON formatter and validator
problem: JSON edits can easily break formatting
done_when: Add format/validate buttons for JSON files with error markers

title: YAML validator
problem: YAML indentation errors are common
done_when: Add YAML validation with clear error messages and line numbers

title: Console command history
problem: Console input loses previous commands and slows admin workflows
done_when: Console input supports history (Up/Down) and persists per instance

title: Common command shortcuts
problem: Admins repeatedly type the same commands
done_when: Provide quick buttons for stop, save-all, say, whitelist reload, and reload

title: Separate command output
problem: Command responses can get lost in noisy logs
done_when: Show command responses in a small dedicated panel with copy

title: Player list from usercache
problem: Admins want to see known players without opening files
done_when: Add a Players tab that reads usercache.json and shows names/uuids

title: Whitelist/ops editors
problem: Editing whitelist.json and ops.json manually is risky
done_when: Provide simple editors for whitelist/ops with validation and save

title: Network info card
problem: Users often misconfigure ports and bind addresses
done_when: Show host/port, detected listen address, and docker mapping hints in UI

title: Create FRP proxy from instance
problem: Creating proxies requires copying ports manually
done_when: From a running instance, user can generate a proxy config with one click

title: Per-proxy health indicator
problem: Proxy list does not show if a proxy is working
done_when: Show last check time, reachability, and error per proxy

title: FRP client logs
problem: FRP failures are hard to debug without logs
done_when: Expose FRP client logs in Panel with filter and download

title: Disk usage display
problem: Users cannot see if a node is running out of disk
done_when: Nodes view shows total/free disk and per-instance disk usage estimate

title: Version mismatch warnings
problem: Panel/daemon version mismatches can cause subtle bugs
done_when: Show warnings when daemon protocol/version differs and suggest upgrade

title: Daemon self-update helper
problem: Updating the daemon requires manual steps
done_when: Provide UI guidance and optional command to download new daemon binary safely

title: Multiple admin accounts
problem: Single shared password does not scale and is insecure
done_when: Support multiple admin users with usernames and per-user sessions

title: Two-factor authentication
problem: Password-only login is weaker than desired
done_when: Add optional TOTP-based 2FA per user with recovery codes

title: Login rate limiting
problem: Brute-force attempts are not mitigated
done_when: Add IP-based rate limiting on login endpoints with safe defaults

title: Session management UI
problem: Users cannot see or revoke active sessions
done_when: Add sessions list with revoke-all and revoke-single actions

title: Rotate panel secret
problem: Long-lived secrets increase risk over time
done_when: Add a command/UI to rotate the server secret and invalidate sessions safely

title: API tokens for automation
problem: Automations currently require using admin session cookies
done_when: Add API token generation and authentication for /api endpoints

title: Instance resource graphs
problem: Users want to understand memory/CPU usage trends
done_when: Add simple charts for CPU/memory per instance over time

title: Stats streaming endpoint
problem: Panel cannot draw graphs without metrics feed
done_when: Daemon streams periodic CPU/memory stats per instance and node

title: Disk usage per instance
problem: Panel needs disk usage breakdown per instance
done_when: Daemon adds command to compute instance directory size with caching

title: Server TPS indicator
problem: Admins care about TPS/MSPT but UI lacks it
done_when: Provide a TPS estimate from logs parsing or optional plugin integration

title: Compressed backups
problem: Backups can be large and slow to copy
done_when: Support optional compressed backups (tar.gz) with progress

title: Backup restore points view
problem: Restore UX is still heavy for frequent use
done_when: Add restore points view with metadata (time, size, comment) and restore action

title: Server jar update checks
problem: Keeping server jars updated is manual and risky
done_when: Add update check for known server types and a safe upgrade flow

title: Paper/Purpur installer
problem: Users commonly use Paper/Purpur but must install manually
done_when: Add installer for Paper/Purpur with version selection and verify checksums

title: New instance creation wizard
problem: Creating an instance feels fragmented and confusing
done_when: Add a guided wizard: name, type, version, memory, port, then create

title: JVM args presets
problem: Tuning JVM args is confusing and error-prone
done_when: Provide presets (default, aikar, conservative) and show resulting args

title: Memory presets and warnings
problem: Users pick Xmx/Xms values that crash the server or OS
done_when: UI offers memory presets and warns if exceeding node memory

title: Pre-start port conflict check
problem: Start failures due to port conflicts are common
done_when: Before starting, UI/daemon checks port availability and shows a clear fix

title: Port reservation support
problem: Multiple instances starting concurrently can race on ports
done_when: Daemon supports reserving ports for instance start to avoid races

title: Unified Danger Zone
problem: Destructive actions are scattered and easy to misclick
done_when: All destructive actions are grouped under a 'Danger Zone' with strong confirmations

title: Undo delete snackbar
problem: Even with confirmations, users sometimes delete by mistake
done_when: After delete, show undo snackbar for a short period (when trash enabled)

title: Version update banner
problem: Users don't know when panel/daemon updates are available
done_when: Show banner if a newer release is available (manual check configurable)

title: Go unit tests in CI
problem: Daemon behavior changes can regress without coverage
done_when: Ensure CI runs go test for daemon packages and fails on test failures

title: Panel linting
problem: Code style regressions slip in over time
done_when: Add a lightweight lint script (eslint) and run in CI

title: Reduce panel bundle size
problem: Initial load can be slow on low-end devices
done_when: Code-split heavy views and avoid large dependencies on initial route

title: Virtualize file list
problem: Large directories can make the Files view slow
done_when: Virtualize file list rendering and keep scroll stable

title: WebSocket reconnect backoff
problem: Temporary network issues cause noisy reconnect loops
done_when: Use exponential backoff with jitter and clearer status UI

title: Offline-friendly caching
problem: Panel becomes blank during brief disconnections
done_when: Cache last known state and show stale indicators during offline mode

title: Contributor guide
problem: New contributors lack guidance for dev setup and conventions
done_when: Add CONTRIBUTING.md with local dev, test, and release notes
